mapper.insert: insert into tbl_product(PROD_NO, NAME, CUS_GENDER, COMP_NAME, PRICE, LINK, IMG, ADMIN_NO, PRODTYPE_NO) values (seq_product.nextval, #{name}, #{cusGender}, #{compName}, #{price}, #{link}, #{img}, #{adminNo}, #{prodtypeNo})
mapper.select: select PROD_NO, NAME, CUS_GENDER, COMP_NAME, PRICE, LINK, IMG, REGDATE, ADMIN_NO, PRODTYPE_NO from tbl_product where PROD_NO =#{prodNo}
mapper.update: update tbl_product set NAME = #{name}, CUS_GENDER =#{cusGender}, COMP_NAME =#{compName}, PRICE =#{price}, LINK =#{link}, IMG =#{img}, REGDATE =sysdate, ADMIN_NO =#{adminNo}, PRODTYPE_NO =#{prodtypeNo} where PROD_NO =#{prodNo}
mapper.select: select count(PROD_NO) from tbl_product where PROD_NO > 0
